attributes.action: stop our troops from paying tax,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you agree that our troops should be exempt from paying tax,then please sign this petition,They risk their lives and limbs,and never ask for anything in return,so the least the goverment can do is too give them something back,after all its not much too ask,considering our troops have too pay for everything out of their wages,ie-food,accomodation,clothes for certain events etc,,its an outrage that they have too pay tax,when on tour of duty,risking their lives,being away from  family and loved ones for months on end,so lets try and do something too stop tax while our troops our away.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
